mapper.update:
update deal_record
deal_record.cmd_no = #{CmdNo},
deal_record.deal_remark = #{DealRemark},
deal_record.deal_result = #{DealResult},
deal_record.deal_time = #{DealTime},
deal_record.delete_audit_status = #{DeleteAuditStatus},
deal_record.delete_time = #{DeleteTime},
deal_record.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
deal_record.operator = #{Operator},
deal_record.order_detail_id = #{OrderDetailId},
deal_record.workarea_id = #{WorkareaId},
deal_record.workshop_info_id = #{WorkshopInfoId}
deal_record.update_time= current_timestamp
deal_record.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select deal_record.cmd_no, deal_record.create_time, deal_record.deal_remark, deal_record.deal_result, deal_record.deal_time, deal_record.delete_audit_status, deal_record.delete_time, deal_record.id, deal_record.is_delete, deal_record.operator, deal_record.order_detail_id, deal_record.update_time, deal_record.workarea_id, deal_record.workshop_info_id form deal_record
